item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 30, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Everyone knows all the apps on your phone (239 points | 100 comments)
2. Towards fearless SIMD, 7 years later (71 points | 14 comments)
3. Utah becomes first US state to ban fluoride in its water (139 points | 286 comments)

26. Introduction to Open Source Laptop Project (6 points | 1 comment)
27. OSS-SEC: Three bypasses of Ubuntu's unprivileged user namespace restrictions (44 points | 9 comments)

29. "Moonshots" Initiative to Secure the Future of RISC OS (22 points | 5 comments)
30. Rescission of the Final Scientific Integrity Policy of the NIH (6 points | discuss)
